external_games.name: I Am The Prosecutor: No Evidence? No Problem!
I Am the Prosecutor: No Evidence? No Problem!

name: I Am the Prosecutor: No Evidence? No Problem!
storyline: Without any evidence, can you still convict those who are guilty of terrible crimes? Of course you can! It's all a matter of convincing the Jury! An abusive, narcissistic mother has been lashing out against her daughter for almost as long as she was born. Now as an Adult, the daughter decides to press charges against her abusive mother! Play as the prosecutor in charge of this case and give the daughter much needed closure so that she may be able to move on and live a normal life! It's not gonna be easy though, the defense is quite formidable herself...
summary: I Am The Prosecutor is a non-linear visual novel about defending a cute tomboy named Sophie where you're given just 30 seconds to make the right choice each time. Help make Sophie's case against her abusive mother and give her much needed closure.
